changes.description: Add per-group rate limiting and error handling
Preload blueprints, structures, and all types on startup
Add dedicated moon endpoint for starbase locations
Add Jita market endpoint for improved price accuracy
Pause ESI and API operations when window is minimized
Optimize assets and contracts tab performance
Force re-render when contracts or market orders update
Prevent duplicate API calls and fix race conditions
Ensure reference data reloads after cache clear
Resolve race conditions in price fetching and type resolution
Simplify tree building and fix location resolution
